There are really only two success principles to selling your home - marketing and negotiation. Today, I will focus on marketing, but stay tuned for part two in our video series to learn everything you need to know about negotiation. Marketing is important because if nobody knows your home is for sale, nobody will buy it. There are three main pillars to a good marketing plan - professional photos and videos, target marketing, and home staging. To learn more, watch this short video.

The Importance of Marketing Your Home

There are really only two success principles to selling your home - marketing and negotiation. Today, I will focus on marketing, but stay tuned for part two in our video series to learn everything you need to know about negotiation. Marketing is important because if nobody knows your home is for sale, nobody will buy it. There are three main pillars to a good marketing plan - professional photos and videos, target marketing, and home staging. To learn more, watch this short video.
